snippet: The XC90 is an S.U.V. that is the first of a new line of vehicles from the Swedish automaker that will include a new connected-car system that works with Apple’s CarPlay. app.
lead_paragraph: The XC90 is an S.U.V. that is the first of a new line of vehicles from the Swedish automaker that will include a new connected-car system that works with Apple’s CarPlay. app.

headline.main: Volvo XC90: The First of a New Breed
